Service Details: - Supports, encourages, and improves the quality of education and the well being of students in the Central Okanagan School District- Encourages PACs to provide a parental voice to educational decision making- Promotes and encourages parental involvement
Eligibility: Any parent of a student enrolled in the Central Okanagan School District may attend COPAC meetings and may vote if they are the elected PAC representative of their child's school
Meetings: First Mon of each month, 7pm, Oct - Nov and Jan - May: Hollywood Road Education Centre, 1040 Hollywood Road, Kelowna
Address & Map: 1040 Hollywood RdKelowna, BC     V1X 4N2View MapQuest Map
